properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 22 at 3:03PM EST until January 26 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
7 to 10 ft.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Cape Lookout to Surf City.

* WHEN...Until 10 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
